<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Maker of Miracles](/Feats.aspx?ID=4706) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[miraculous spell](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You are a conduit for truly deific power. You gain an additional 10th-rank spell slot.
name: Maker of Miracles
